member.name: T:Sias.DynamicWasher.SWashProgramBuffer.SPlateConverter
member.summary: Plate (Item) converter for items with orientation 0°

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SWashProgramBuffer.SPlateConverter.Compare(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary:
Compare method
This comparer allows to sort tip positions by its X/Y positions. Cavities with smaller X values are sorted before those with higher X value. If the X values are identical cavities with higher Y values are sorted before the ones with smaller Y values.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SWashProgramBuffer.SPlateConverter.#ctor(Sias.Core.SPosition,Sias.Core.Interfaces.SCavityCollection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SPlateConverter class.

false to indicate the plate orientation is identical to teh slot, true otherwise

member.name: T:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice
member.summary:
Dynamic Washer device
The Dynamic Washer device is an \ref AccessibleDevices "accessible device" representing exactly one dynamic Washer module on a sias instrument. In difference to the standard washer the dynamic Washer is able to load wash programs at runtime.
member.details:
\ingroup Dev_DynamicWasher
The interface includes - configuration properties for DynamicWasher scaling factor and offset - a layout property for the DynamicWasher slot - methods for wash volume and wash item conversions - methods for starting a wash process - methods for receive, send and store wash programs . \b Important: This device only supports full featured DynamicWashers. Those DynamicWashers are able to process a full wash with a single command. The DynamicWasher type adaption is done by the modules firmware.
%SDynamicWasherDevice class diagram
\image html "SDynamicWasherDevice.png"

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.LastProgramID
member.summary: Last used program ID (used for error messages)

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.AddError(System.Int64,System.Object[])
member.summary: Add another error to washer error list
member.param: The code of the error to add

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ResetErrors
member.summary: remove all errors from washer error list

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ReportErrors(System.Object)
member.summary:
Check dynamic washer error list and report errors
This method checks the internal error list and reports the errors.
member.returns: True if the error list is empty or the error have to be ignored otherwise false

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.GetErrorInfos
member.summary:
Error information provider
This method returns the default error messages for all errors which can be generated by this device.
member.returns: A collection with error information

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.HandleModuleError(System.Boolean,System.Object[])
member.summary: This method handles the module errors of SMotor devices
member.details: Possible Module types: - 0x0061 (\ref Sias::CanDev::eMODULE_TYPE_CONST::MT_SIAS_WASHER "MT_SIAS_WASHER") . Handled errors: - eMODULE_ERROR_CONST.ME_TIMEOUT_ERR - eMODULE_ERROR_CONST.ME_INIT_ERROR - eMODULE_ERROR_CONST.ME_INIT_ERROR2 - eMODULE_ERROR_CONST.ME_NOT_ALLOWED - eMODULE_ERROR_CONST.ME_NOT_INIT - eMODULE_ERROR_CONST.ME_CMD_ERROR1 - eMODULE_ERROR_CONST.ME_WRONG_VALVE .
member.param: true to force the handler to handle the error
member.returns: Result of the error handling.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.StoreWashProgram(System.Byte)
member.summary:
Store wash program (from tranfer memory)
This method forces the dynamic washer to store the wash program the washers transfer memory using the defined
WashProgramID.
member.param: Wash program index to store (only flash indexes: 9..127)
member.returns: The error code of the operation, 0 if the wash program transferred successfully

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.LoadWashProgram(System.Byte)
member.summary:
Load wash program to transfer memory
This method forces the dynamic washer to load the wash program identified by
WashProgramID into the washer transfer memory area.
member.param: The wash program index to load:\n - 1..8: wash program from config buffer - 9..127: wash program from flash pool .
member.returns: The error code of the operation, 0 if the wash program transfered successfully

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.CheckWashProgram(System.Byte)
member.summary:
Check wash program.
This method forces the dynamic washer to check a wash program in transfer, config or flash memory. The wash program gets identified by its
WashProgramID.
member.param: The wash program index to load:\n - 0: wash program in RAM - 1..8: wash program from config memory - 9..127: wash program from flash pool .
member.returns: The Result of check, 0 if the wash program is correctly

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.DeleteWashProgram(System.Byte)
member.summary:
Delete wash program from flash memory
This method forces the dynamic washer to delete a wash program in flash memory. The wash program gets identified by its
WashProgramID.
member.param: The wash program index to load (9..127).
member.returns: The Result of the operation, 0 if the wash program is deleted

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.SetPlateDefinitionMode(System.Byte)
member.summary:
Set Plate definition mode
This method is used to define the plate definition mode.
member.param: Plate Use Mode: - 0: Use plate definition stored with wash program - 1: Use plate definition in transfer memory (dynamic)
member.returns: 0 for normal plate mode 1 for transfer memory plate mode

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.StartWash(System.Byte,Sias.Core.Interfaces.IItem,System.UInt16,System.Double)
member.summary:
Start wash program execution.
This command starts the defined wash program on the washer.
member.param: The identifier of the wash program
The Item to wash (null for using the default plate definition)
Rows to wash (each bit represents a row)\n Attention: Some Washers may not support individual row washing. In this case the DynamicWasher may wash unselected rows also.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.StartWash(System.Byte,System.UInt16,System.Double)
member.summary:
Start wash program execution.
This method starts execution of the wash program identified by . For execution the plate definition of the actual item on the washer slot is used. If there is no item on washer slot the plate definition stored at the washer is used.
member.param: The identifier of the wash program
Rows to wash (each bit represents a row)\n Attention: Some Washers may not support individual row washing. In this case the DynamicWasher may wash unselected rows also.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.StartWash(Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramData,Sias.Core.Interfaces.IItem,System.UInt16,System.Double)
member.summary:
Start wash program execution.
This method sends the defined wash program to dynamic washer and starts its excution. The plate definition is taken from given wash plate item. If the item is not defined (null) the plate definition stored at the washer is used.
member.param: The Item to be used for wash plate definition
Rows to wash (each bit represents a row)\n Attention: Some dynamic washers may not support individual row washing. In this case the DynamicWasher may wash unselected rows also.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.StartWash(Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramData,System.UInt16,System.Double)
member.summary:
Start wash program execution.
This method sens the defined wash program to the dynamic washer and starts its execution. For execution the plate definition of the actual item on the washer slot is used. If there is no item on washer slot the plate definition stored at the washer is used.
member.param: Rows to wash (each bit represents a row)\n Attention: Some DynamicWashers may not support individual row washing. In this case the DynamicWasher may wash unselected rows also.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.StartPrime(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Int16,System.Int16,Sias.WashManager.SPowerModeValue)
member.summary:
Start prime procedure
This method starts a prime sequence for the defined liquid.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.StartPrime(System.Byte,Sias.WashManager.SWashPrimeProcedure)
member.summary:
Start prime procedure
This method starts a prime sequence for the defined liquid.
member.param: The prime procedure (cycles, volume, delay and power)

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.WaitForEndOfWashing
member.summary:
Waits for the end of the running wash program.
This method waits infinite until the wash program finishes.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.StopWash
member.summary:
Stop a running wash program.
Stops an already but still not finished wash program.
member.remarks: \b Important: This method will only work if the connected washer device supports wash program interruption. Not all washer devices will support wash program interruption!

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.CheckWashProgram(Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramData)
member.summary:
Check wash program.
This method forces the washer device driver to check the given wash program. The method will report errors to teh error manager.
member.remarks: \b Important: This method overwrites the tranfer memory of the dynamic washer devcice!
member.param: The program data block of the wash program to check.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.SendWashProgramToWasher(Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramData,Sias.Core.Interfaces.IItem)
member.summary:
Transfer wash procedure to washer transfer memory.
This method send the defined wash program together with the plate definitions of the given plate to the washer (in RAM section).
member.param: The item where to get the wash positions (null to use item from wash slot)
member.returns: True if wash program successfully send, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.SendWashProgramToWasher(Sias.WashManager.SWashProgramData,Sias.Core.Interfaces.IItem,System.Byte)
member.summary:
Transfer wash procedure to washer transfer memory.
This method send the defined wash program together with the plate definitions of the given plate to the washer (in RAM section).
member.param: The item where to get the wash positions (null to use item from wash slot)
Wash program index to store (only flash indexes: 9..127)
member.returns: True if wash program successfully send, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.GetWashProgramFromWasher
member.summary:
Get wash program from washer
This method gets the actual wash program from washer (RAM section).
member.returns: The actual wash program.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.GetWashProgramFromWasher(System.Byte)
member.summary:
Get wash program from washer
This method gets the actual wash program from washer (RAM section).
member.param: The wash program index to load:\n - 0: wash program in RAM - 1..8: wash program from config memory - 9..127: wash program from flash pool .
member.returns: The actual wash program.

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.AttachLayoutData(Sias.Core.Interfaces.ILayoutDevice)
member.summary:
Attach layout data.
This method tries to attach the layout data found at the given layout device to the device. If this succeeds, it returns true. If it fails, it returns false. In this case the calling method should retry until it finds a fitting layout device.
member.param: The layout device to attach or null to unattach an attached layout device.
member.returns: True if attachable, false if not.

member.name: P:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.UseDynamicPlates
member.summary:
Use dynamic plate definition flag
Activating this option will force the washer using always the layout plate data. Otherwise the stored plate information will be used
member.value: true if dynamic plate usage is active otherwise false.

member.name: P:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.WashProgramBuffer
member.summary: Wash program buffer property (use only with lot of care)

member.name: P:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.IsWashing
member.summary: Gets the IsWashing flag from dynamic washer.
member.value: True as long as the dynaic washer is active (washing), otherwise false.

member.name: P:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.PauseWash
member.summary:
Pause washing flag
This property is used to pause a wash program. The washer/wash head stops moving, but the wash program did not get aborted. The program can get continued by setting the PauseWash flag back to false.
member.remarks: \b Important: The PausWash flag gets reset on start of a new wash program.

member.name: T:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.SDynamicWasherFlags
member.summary:
Dynamic washer flags enumerator.
This enumerator defines the dynamic washer flags.

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.SDynamicWasherFlags.UseDynamicPlates
member.summary: First robot flag (only for demo, not used yet)

member.name: M:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.WashErrorInfo.#ctor(System.Int64,System.Object[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the WashErrorInfo class.

member.name: T:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes
member.summary: This static class keeps the error code constants of the \ref Sias::DynamicWasher::SDynamicWasherDevice errors.

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.TimeoutError
member.summary: 0x1350: Timeout error e.g. vacuum not reached in time

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.DeviceAlreadyActive
member.summary: 0x13F4: Command not allowed as module is already active.

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.DeviceNotInit
member.summary: 0x13F1: Command not allowed as module is not init yet.

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.MissingAspirateProcedure
member.summary: 0x0B30: no valid wash aspirate procedure pointer

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.MissingDispenseProcedure
member.summary: 0x0B40: no valid wash dispense procedure pointer

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.TooManyDispenseProcedures
member.summary: 0x10001: Conversion error - Too many dispense procedures

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.TooManyAspirateProcedures
member.summary: 0x10002: Conversion error - Too many aspirate procedures

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.TooManyRowProcedures
member.summary: 0x10003: Conversion error - Too many row procedures

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.TooManyAspirateSteps
member.summary: 0x10004: Conversion error - Too many aspirate steps

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.TooManyDispenseSteps
member.summary: 0x10005: Conversion error - Too many dispense steps

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.AspirateNameListError
member.summary: 0x10006: Conversion error - No of used aspirate procedure indexes does not match to no of aspirate procedure names

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.DispenseNameListError
member.summary: 0x10007: Conversion error - No of used dispense procedure indexes does not match to no of dispense procedure names

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.TooManyWashPositions
member.summary: 0x10011: Item Conversion error - Too many wash positions (rows)

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.InvalidHeightDeviation
member.summary: 0x10012: Item Conversion warning - Invalid height deviation this washer only support one wash height per program

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.InvalidItemOrientation
member.summary: 0x10013: Item Conversion warning - Invalid Item orientation, this washer only supports orientation of 0°, 90°, 180° and 270°

member.name: F:Sias.DynamicWasher.SDynamicWasherDevice.ErrorCodes.MultiError
member.summary: 0x20000: Multi error - reports a collection of errors
